item.title: Netflix revises offer for Warner Bros. Discovery to make it an all-cash transaction
item.description: Netflix is revising its $72 billion offer for Warner Bros

item.title: Hopes fade in fourth day of search for dozens missing in Karachi shopping plaza fire
item.description: Hopes of finding survivors of a Karachi shopping plaza fire have faded

item.title: Internet shutdown squeezes Iran's ailing businesses already hurt by crashing currency
item.description: Iranians have been struggling with a near-total internet blackout for nearly two weeks

item.title: Russia batters Ukraine's power grid again as officials seek momentum in US-led peace talks
item.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy says that Russia has launched more than 300 drones and missiles in a nighttime attack on Ukraine's power grid
